results.name: a(n) = (2*n)! * [x^(2*n)] (-x/(1 - x))^n/((1 - x)*n!).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..300
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Laguerre Polynomial
Index entries for sequences related to Laguerre polynomials
formula: E.g.f.: 2*K(-16*x)/Pi, where K() is the complete elliptic integral of the first kind.
mathematica: Table[(2 n)! SeriesCoefficient[(-x/(1 - x))^n /((1 - x) n!), {x, 0, 2 n}], {n, 0, 15}]
nmax = 15; CoefficientList[Series[2 EllipticK[-16 x]/Pi, {x, 0, nmax}], x] Range[0, nmax]!
program: (MAGMA) R:= RealField(); [Round((-16)^n*Gamma(n+1/2)^2/(Pi(R)*Gamma(n+1) )): n in [0..30]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Feb 06 2018
xref: Central terms of triangles A021009 and A021010.
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Nov 21 2017
